entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
